extension_description.message: LGTM (Looks Good To Me) lets you put image urls into a text field when you're happy with what you're seeing.

options_description.message:
LGTM (Looks Good To Me) is a browser extension that lets you copy (or insert into text fields) image when you're happy with what you're seeing.

Full source code is available at https://github.com/rafalgrodzinski/lgtm.
